    • Field Detail

      • style

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> style
        CSS styles for the title. In styled mode, the subtitle style is given in the .highcharts-subtitle class.

        Try it:

         •  Custom color and weight
         •  Styled mode

        default:

         { "color": "#666666" }

      • verticalAlign

        public java.lang.String verticalAlign
        The vertical alignment of the title. Can be one of "top", "middle" and "bottom". When a value is given, the title behaves as floating.

        Try it:

         •  Footnote at the bottom right of plot area

        accepted values:

         ["top", "middle", "bottom"]

      • text

        public java.lang.String text
        The subtitle of the chart.

        Try it:

         •  Custom subtitle
         •  Formatted and linked text.

      • align

        public java.lang.String align
        The horizontal alignment of the subtitle. Can be one of "left", "center" and "right".

        Try it:

         •  Footnote at right of plot area

        accepted values:

         ["left", "center", "right"]

        default:

         center

      • useHTML

        public java.lang.Boolean useHTML
        Whether to [use HTML](http://www.highcharts.com/docs/chart-concepts/labels- and-string-formatting#html) to render the text.

        default:

         false

      • y

        public java.lang.Number y
        The y position of the subtitle relative to the alignment within chart. spacingTop and chart.spacingBottom. By default the subtitle is laid out below the title unless the title is floating.

        Try it:

         •  Footnote at the bottom right of plot area

        default:

         null

      • x

        public java.lang.Number x
        The x position of the subtitle relative to the alignment within chart. spacingLeft and chart.spacingRight.

        Try it:

         •  Footnote at right of plot area

        default:

         0

      • widthAdjust

        public java.lang.Number widthAdjust
        Adjustment made to the subtitle width, normally to reserve space for the exporting burger menu.

        Try it:

         •  Wider menu, greater padding

        default:

         -44

      • floating

        public java.lang.Boolean floating
        When the subtitle is floating, the plot area will not move to make space for it.

        Try it:

         •  Floating title and subtitle

        default:

         false
